title: WTT: I want to downgrade my T206 SGC 50 Milan - TRADED
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT: I want to downgrade my T206 SGC 50 Milan - TRADED
posts.post_content:
This one is a little too nice to be alongside my beaters... looking to downgrade this SGC 50 of Clyde Milan into a SGC 40 and SGC 30 of your choice (provided I don't already have one).  Any offer welcome.

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100037/DSC_0006_2/web.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100037/DSC_0007/web.jpg[/IMG]
